title: MasterClass: Brandon McMillan Teaches Dog Training
overview: The Emmy-winning host of "Lucky Dog," Brandon McMillan is an expert trainer dedicated to building relationships between humans and animals. In his MasterClass, Brandon shares his simple, effective training system to help you develop trust and control with your dog. From using commands like sit, stay, and down to fixing barking and digging, you'll learn how to improve your dog's behaviorâ€”and create a lifelong bond.
